name: Buzz (Prototype)
description:
You're a tiny helicopter pollinating flowers! Or are you a normal-sized helicopter pollinating giant flowers? Either way, fly the helicopter, pollinate the flowers, and win? Well, you don't really win, but play until you get bored.

This is a quick prototype we (Gopherwood Studios) threw together. If you like it, let us know and maybe we'll flesh it out into something a little bigger.

Thanks for playing!

Twitter - @Gopherwood

Email - feedback@gopherwoodstudios.com
